duties_responsibilities.duty: Demonstrate superior customer service and a genuine desire to serve residents and guests.
Greet and direct residents and guests and maintain an active presence at the Front Desk.
Handle concierge duties including processing mail and packages, answering questions, making recommendations, and making arrangements for various services.
Possess in-depth knowledge of local area attractions, nightlife, and services to enhance resident living experience.
Adhere to all Front Desk procedures, company standards for resident and guest services, and undertake administrative tasks.
Resolve resident and guest concerns in a professional and timely manner, and maintain a polished appearance at all times.
Assist in the training of concierge staff and follow safety procedures while maintaining a safe work environment.
Perform other job-related duties as directed.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalency required. Degree in hospitality management or business administration desired. Fluency in one or more foreign languages is a plus.
